scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build resources/js/application.js -d static/assets --public-url . --cache-dir .parcel-cache
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build resources/js/application.js -d static/assets --public-url . --cache-dir .parcel-cache
scripts.watch: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel watch resources/js/application.js -d static/assets --public-url . --cache-dir .parcel-cache
